short_description_localized.en: Enjoy members-only rates at Hotel Caza.
short_description_localized.es: Te ofrecemos una tarifa especial para mostrar que al igual que nosotros. No te olvides de compartir que te vas a quedar con nosotros haciendo clic en el bot√≥n de Facebook en cualquier momento al hacer la reserva.

description_localized.en:
Take advantage of your AAA / AARP rate discount when you book your next vacation with Hotel Caza, one of San Francisco’s premier hotels located just steps from Fisherman’s Wharf, North Beach, and the Embarcadero.

  • AAA and AARP members save up to 10% off on our Best Available Rate.

Must show valid AAA/AARP membership card upon check-in.
